title: RENGAR ULT BUG (jump 2 times)
body:
Bug occured in a ranked game where i played rengar. I recorded what happened so just watch the video but here is what happened in text:
I used ult> Ran right next to diana while she dashed to our shaco > Attack her with empowered Q (she had her shield on) > Then she uses her E, while I am still in the Q animation > She flashes away (out of normal attack range) > I try to attack her and instead if walking jump another time.

patch 5.16

replies.body:
It`s not a bug. If u are in a bush or in stealth u can jump on enemies, if u go our of the bush or lose stealth because of dmg or and autoattack u have still 0.5 Seconds (i am not that sure about the time) time to jump on enemies.
In your example: Rengar used Q on Diana without jumping, then Diana flashed away within 0.5 Seconds and so he was able to jump.

Ok so that worked because I didn't jump when I first hit her? I still had my jump ready and it triggered when she flashed away? Hm... Didn't know that worked with the ult as well, thank you for the answer. :D
